title: Appointment of Paul Farrer as Deputy Managing Director
head_office_address: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document for Ellah Lakes Plc.

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as an official announcement regarding the appointment of a new Deputy Managing Director at Ellah Lakes Plc. It outlines the background of the appointee, Mr. Paul Farrer, and his role within the company, as well as comments from the Chief Executive Officer.

#### Key Dates
- **Announcement Date**: August 1, 2022
- **Listing Date on Nigerian Exchange Limited**: January 14, 1993

#### Key Personnel
- **New Deputy Managing Director**: Mr. Paul Farrer
- **Chief Executive Officer**: Chuka Mordi
- **Company Secretary**: Olumoroti Alli
- **Board of Directors**: 
  - Olu Akpata
  - Chuka Mordi
  - Shehu Abubakar
  - Osaro Oyegun
  - Evans Jakpa-Johns
  - Maxwell Oko
  - Nnenna Onyewuchi
  - Enotie Ogbebor
  - Chijioke Dozie
  - Hauwa Nuru
  - Joe Attueyi
  - Charles Anajemba

#### Background of Mr. Paul Farrer
- **Previous Roles**:
  - Country Manager for Innscor International
  - Group Executive Director & Chief Operating Officer of Food Concepts Plc
  - CEO of Nascon Allied Industries Plc for the last seven years, managing over 600 staff.
- **Industry Experience**: Extensive experience in the Nigerian private sector and a proven track record in operational leadership.

#### Responsibilities
Mr. Farrer will focus on:
- Operational growth and development of Ellah Lakes Plc.
- Expansion of the Ellah Lakes Staple Crop Processing Zones (SCPZ's) strategy across Nigeria.

#### CEO's Comments
Chuka Mordi expressed enthusiasm about Mr. Farrer’s appointment, highlighting:
- The value he brings to the team.
- His proven track record in both international and Nigerian contexts.
- The ambitious growth targets set for Ellah Lakes Plc and Mr. Farrer’s capability to navigate the challenging Nigerian environment.

#### Company Overview
- **Company Name**: Ellah Lakes Plc.
- **Industry**: Agribusiness specializing in the cultivation of Oil Palm, Cassava, and Soya beans.
- **Operational States**: Edo, Enugu, and Ondo States.
- **Community Impact**: The company has contributed to the empowerment of local communities and is diversifying its operations across various agricultural value chains, including Maize and Rice.

#### Contact Information
- **Website**: www.ellahlakes.com

#### Conclusion
The document concludes with a formal signature from Olumoroti Alli, representing OAKE Legal as the Company Secretary, affirming the authenticity of the announcement. 

This summary encapsulates all significant details from the corporate disclosure document regarding the appointment of Mr. Paul Farrer and the operational context of Ellah Lakes Plc.
